itemDisplayName: Vertcore Node and Utilities for Vertcoin on CentOS VM
description: This template uses the Azure Linux CustomScript extension to deploy a Vertcore Node instance with the complete set of Vertcoin utilities. The deployment template creates a CentOS VM, installs Vertcore and provides a simple vertcored executable. With this template, you will be running a full node on the Vertcoin network as well as a block explorer called Insight.
summary: Deploy a CentOS VM with a Vertcore Node on the Vertcoin network.
